quests.title: Find Friend at the Mansion
quests.description: Locate and locate a friend of the requestor within the mansion.

quests.title: Find Friend at Mansion
quests.description: Go to the mansion to locate a friend of the speaker.

quests.title: Mansion Investigation
quests.description: Go to the mansion to locate a friend and uncover any hidden information.

quests.title: Discover Hidden Lab and Crystal
quests.description: Find the hidden passage in the basement, enter the study/lab, and determine the purpose of the crystal and machine.

quests.title: Find Friend in Mansion
quests.description: Investigate a mansion to locate a friend of the quest giver.

npcs.name: Sjaak
npcs.description: Party member/fast runner who was sent on the quest.

npcs.name: Unknown Friend
npcs.description: The friend Sjaak is meant to find.

plot_hooks.summary: Hidden passage discovered in the mansion’s basement.
plot_hooks.details: A secret entry concealed behind barrels and slime trails leads to a study/lab area.

plot_hooks.summary: Crystal and machine found in the hidden study.
plot_hooks.details: A crystal is located next to a machine; its purpose and connection to the teleportation incident remain unclear.

plot_hooks.summary: Unexplained teleportation of Sjaak.
plot_hooks.details: Sjaak was teleported away after interacting with the machine, raising questions about the mechanism and its effects on the party.

plot_hooks.summary: Friend’s whereabouts unknown.
plot_hooks.details: Despite searching the mansion, no sign of the friend was found, leaving the main objective unresolved.

plot_hooks.summary: Hidden passage behind a beer barrel in the basement.
plot_hooks.details: The party discovered a secret doorway after manipulating a barrel, leading to a study/laboratory.

plot_hooks.summary: The purpose of the crystal found in the hidden laboratory.
plot_hooks.details: Hints suggest a crystal is involved in a device, possibly tied to money or teleportation.

plot_hooks.summary: Teleportation of Sjaak.
plot_hooks.details: Sjaak was teleported away from the laboratory, leaving the party confused about why.

plot_hooks.summary: Missing friend at the mansion.
plot_hooks.details: The original objective was to find a friend, but no one responded inside the mansion.

plot_hooks.summary: Traces of ooze in the mansion
plot_hooks.details: Spore traces of ooze are found in the mansion, suggesting a mysterious creature or contamination.

plot_hooks.summary: Hidden passage behind a beer vat
plot_hooks.details: A concealed entrance behind a broken beer vat leads to a basement with a secret laboratory.

plot_hooks.summary: Teleportation machine and crystal
plot_hooks.details: Inside the laboratory is a crystal and a machine that can teleport individuals, leading to an incident where someone was teleported away.

plot_hooks.summary: Hidden laboratory with a crystal and machine behind a disguised vat.
plot_hooks.details: The laboratory contains a crystal and a machine that seem to be connected to teleportation. Sjaak was teleported away after the machine was activated.

plot_hooks.summary: Tracks of 'oezes' and slime trail leading to hidden entrance.
plot_hooks.details: There were traces of 'oezes' (unknown creature) and slime near the vats, suggesting prior activity and a hidden passage.

plot_hooks.summary: Friend's whereabouts uncertain.
plot_hooks.details: The original quest was to find a friend in the mansion, but it remains unclear whether they were found.

plot_hooks.summary: Hidden passage behind beer barrel with slime trail
plot_hooks.details: The basement contains a concealed entrance revealed by a slime-like trail and leaking barrels.

plot_hooks.summary: Crystal and machine in secret laboratory
plot_hooks.details: An underground laboratory holds a crystal and an unnamed machine, suggesting a larger plot.

plot_hooks.summary: Unexplained teleportation of Sjaak
plot_hooks.details: Sjaak was teleported away after the encounter, hinting at teleportation technology or a powerful spell.

plot_hooks.summary: Hints of someone working with strange stone or crystal
plot_hooks.details: Notes mention advice about a stone or crystal and the desire for more money.

plot_hooks.summary: Hidden passage with crystal and machine
plot_hooks.details: A hidden passage leads to a study/laboratory containing a crystal and a machine. The crystal was warned against using.

plot_hooks.summary: Sjaak teleported away
plot_hooks.details: Sjaak entered the hidden passage and was quickly teleported away, leaving the players uncertain of his fate.

plot_hooks.summary: Advice about crystal
plot_hooks.details: Characters were warned not to interact with a certain crystal, yet someone did so to gain more money.

plot_hooks.summary: Crystal that should not be used
plot_hooks.details: Advice was given to avoid interacting with a crystal, yet the friend used it for money.

plot_hooks.summary: Hidden passage to a laboratory
plot_hooks.details: A passage was discovered leading to a study/lab with a crystal and a machine; Sjaak was teleported away through it.

plot_hooks.summary: Teleported away incident
plot_hooks.details: Sjaak was quickly teleported away after entering the laboratory; the narrator also hints at being teleported.

locations.name: Mansion
locations.description: Large building with traces of Ouzes; contains bathrooms and bedrooms.

locations.name: Basement
locations.description: Basement of the mansion, contains a big bottle of beer and a broken access door.

locations.name: Hidden Passage
locations.description: A passage discovered in the basement leading to a hidden study/lab.

locations.name: Study/ Laboratory
locations.description: Room behind the hidden passage with a crystal and a machine.

locations.name: Hidden Laboratory
locations.description: A study/lab behind a disguised passage in the basement, containing a crystal and machine.

locations.name: Secret Laboratory
locations.description: A hidden room behind the basement containing a crystal and a machine.

locations.name: Basement of Mansion
locations.description: The basement houses barrels and a hidden passage to a secret laboratory.

locations.name: Small bar
locations.description: Briefly mentioned as a place where characters met.

locations.name: Study/Lab
locations.description: Laboratory-like room behind the hidden passage, contains a crystal and a machine.

items.name: Crystal
items.description: Magical crystal, advised against using; likely involved in teleportation.

items.name: Machine
items.description: Unspecified machine located in the laboratory.

items.name: Teleportation Machine
items.description: A machine capable of teleporting individuals, powered by the crystal.

items.name: Big Bottle of Beer
items.description: Large bottle of beer found in the basement.
